Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 04 Nov 2018Have u considered topping your special account? You will earned a guaranteed rate of 4%. Since you are 28. For the first $60k in your CPF combined balance (with only up to $20k max from OA), the monies will earn an extra 1%. There since you are still young, u will not have hit the limit yet. Thus it is worthwhile to topup to earn effective 5% return. Risk-free, regardless of market conditions. In additional u will receive tax relief for the topped up amount. Eg, your taxable income is $40k, for every dollar u earn above 40k is taxed at 7%. Therefore, if u topped up $1000 into your special account, u get $1000 tax relief, u saved 7% of $1000 = $70 tax money. Effectively have gotten 7% return on your money, in additional u will earn 4% interest yearly guaranteed. 0 comments0
